fields.Purpose: The purpose of the Evaluation Committee meeting is to allow committee members an opportunity to review and possibly consensus score proposals received in response to 21675 Professional Engineering Services for Asset Management Support
fields.Location: County Center - 25th Floor - Procurement Conf. Room in downtown Tampa
fields.Method: The evaluation committee will meet in-person, all others who need live access to the meeting will be sent invitations to join the meeting.  Provisions have been made for any member of the public desiring to have access to view the meeting
fields.MeetingName: Evaluation Committee Meeting and possible scoring for: 21675 Professional Engineering Services for Asset Management Support

fields.Purpose: The purpose of the meeting is to review the estimated budget and the submitted bids as described in in the Procurement Manual,  Chapter 3.4.13 referencing BOCC Policy 03.02.01.00, on Capital Improvement Projects, the Requesting Department convenes the Bid Review Committee when Bid/Proposal Submittals that exceed $50,000 are ten percent (10%) or more above the estimated construction cost (see Appendix G, Board Policy 03.02.01.00 Bids over 10% Estimate (Construction).
fields.Location: County Center - 18th Floor - old Civil Service Office Conf. Room in downtown Tampa
fields.Method: The bid review committee will meet in-person, all others who need live access to the meeting will be sent invitations to join the meeting.  Provisions have been made for any member of the public desiring to have access to view the meeting.
fields.MeetingName: Bid Review Committee (BRC) for 21656,2 (Waterset Sports Complex)

fields.Purpose: The purpose of the meeting is for the Evaluation Committee to review, evaluate, and score a proposal.
fields.Location: County Center - 25th Floor - Procurement Conf. Room in downtown Tampa
fields.Method: The evaluation committee will meet in person.  Provisions have been made for the public, desiring to have access, to view the meeting.
fields.MeetingName: Evaluation Committee Meeting for RFP 21771, Revenue Impact Study and Fiscal Model

fields.Purpose: The purpose of this meeting is to have the shortlisted firms provide Oral Presentations, as well as, respond to questions pertaining to their presentation.
fields.Location: County Center - 25th Floor - Procurement Conf. Room in downtown Tampa
fields.Method: This meeting will be held by means of communications media technology. Provisions have been made for any member of the public desiring to have access to participate and view the meeting.
fields.MeetingName: Hybrid Oral Presentations - RPS 21444 (Day 1)- Transportation Design and General Engineering Services

fields.Purpose: The purpose of this meeting is to have the shortlisted firms provide Oral Presentations, as well as, respond to questions pertaining to their presentation.
fields.Location: County Center - 25th Floor - Procurement Conf. Room in downtown Tampa
fields.Method: This meeting will be held by means of communications media technology. Provisions have been made for any member of the public desiring to have access to participate and view the meeting.
fields.MeetingName: Hybrid Oral Presentations - RPS 21444 (Day 2) Transportation Design and General Engineering Services
